documents.document: Committed for insanity and crimes against the soul, the worst crime I ever did was play some rock and roll.
@Becs all the best. I had to work today, and I'm 3 hours behind you :)
@plainricedinner ‘Chalk’ on the waterfront between Te Papa and Clyde Quay
@publicaddress having left a boring relationship, Britain is now terrified of its abusive replacement
Read this https://t.co/1zz2axioa1
@pmbillenglish @metiria @AndrewLittleMP I’ll vote for any party whose leader matches this. Show some humanity https://t.co/hWFbRHUUfV
@Knhannah What would Dietrich Bonhoeffer have done? @davidjdobbyn
@Knhannah but my point abt evangelicals remains, a large group that claims doctrinal high ground @davidjdobbyn @Sojourners @ShaneClaiborne
@Knhannah me too, we had a not-so-coded sermon about this last week @davidjdobbyn @Sojourners @ShaneClaiborne
@Knhannah I don’t see how evangelical Christianity can survive its promotion of this regime @davidjdobbyn
Because many have supported him on the grounds they are Christians, but when you look at what Jesus said and did, chalk and cheese #rpt
I’m wondering how Christianity can survive Trump
This https://t.co/fQRdxwJaTQ
@rmi @jordantcarter the chef just cooked me an omelet. It was good. #expatlife
The expression ‘taking one for the team’ comes to mind https://t.co/6bQVCI8cfB
@mikeforbes hey Mike, be kind to yourself
@GrumpyYetAmusin if US conservatives actually cared about life they would get rid of the guns
@juliailse @lytteltonian @peterdarlington well done, guys. You know what for.
@cstross Haven’t they already?
@markboynz @Styla73 around 80 or 81 I think
@Styla73 @markboynz *cough* was on it once. For Trinity Hall, Cambridge.
@Becs whereabouts? I’m in Port Moresby
@Becs yep. My second home
@Becs I’m counting on that :)
@Becs if we ever meet in RL there’s gonna have to be so much music…
@Becs i love that track

It’s all about you, Julian. Of course it is.

OIA to MFAT and MBIE: How much has been spent on TPP split by ministerial and official travel, policy advice, analysis and communications?
@glynmoody they make a desert and call it peace? Not bad for a mathematician (both of us!)
@richardgsmithnz the reason you didn’t see me is that you weren’t there
In the 6 weeks since I was last in Port Moresby the rains have come. The land has gone from burnt brown to lush green
This is just 'Project Fear", right? RT @kennethmac2000: Lloyds of London are leaving London https://t.co/sOryGWgmRy
Sorry @usembassynz, unfollowing. It’s not personal :(
Have been awake for 2 hours already and it’s only 5:30 am. Don’t you just love jetlag? Might as well go the gym…
No reports of damage in Bougainville quake https://t.co/2mlGaKUAPz HT @radionz
@elpie yes, it was noticeable but not strong here in Port Moresby. Not sure what state Bougainville is in though
So we meet again, Port Moresby
Waiting for a plane at AKL international. Weather outside is sub-Wellington in its awfulness. Glad I’m flying out
@richardboock yes. Not wanting to mention any names, but...
@richardboock people with a public profile based on sex obsession...
@richardboock yes same. He went down for it, but I rather admire him for it
@peterdarlington shades of Edge of Darkness - do you remember that one?
@MurrayWills there are newbies and there are oldbies @JaneTHoye @MiramarMike
@MurrayWills I am repeatedly advised that the patriarchy is to be smashed so I would like to distance myself from it @JaneTHoye @MiramarMike
@peterdarlington I got out to Auckland. It's no better
@JaneTHoye it's best to think of ourselves as classics :) @MurrayWills @MiramarMike
@BruceBuckman just so long as my silver bird can spread its wings at 7am...
The other way round is OK though? https://t.co/XHL3XF9mUf
Sitting here at AKL airport for a couple of hours, the weather has gone from poor to vile. Is it always as bad as this?
@dpfdpf I'd forgotten that but you are right, it was kind of grandfathered into the system
@MurrayWills a fellow old fart! @MiramarMike
@MiramarMike Gopher?
@MiramarMike I was going to tweet "You're not that old" but you probably are :)
I remember Archie https://t.co/bAkqiSeb5k
@miss__haley Yes! I arrive on the 23rd and stay for a few days. Let's do it!
@althecat Australia got done like a dinner in the FTA which the US granted it, supposedly to reward it for joining the egregious war in Iraq
@miss__haley not this time but I do have a ticket to Vienna in March
I'm at AKL international. Going to check out of Aotearoa for a few weeks in the morning. Look after it please.
@SparkNZ not as such, no. :(
@wellykowhai that's because crowdsourcing is about other people and monetisation is about you (so to speak) - fundamentally opposed
@GrumpyYetAmusin Indiana Jones was no spring chicken @buzzandhum
@SparkNZ when does the Endless Summer start?
@templetonf sorry to hear, Fleur. All the best to you
Arrived at @FlyAirNZ Koru Lounge NSN and was asked if I’d like to take the earlier flight in case the weather closes in. Great service!
Trump says he’s gonna end American carnage - he’s going to take all the guns away, right?
@garthbiggs I rather like Retsina with olives and pickled chillies
@LI_politico @JJPalethorpe Have we really eaten 16 sheep each?
@mashmatix The People’s Republic of Whangamomona @teh_aimee
@billbennettnz Hmm. I have one of their disc players. Hardly ever play discs though.
@billbennettnz Is the same Oppo that makes high end blu-ray players?
@billbennettnz Good luck - my experience is it asks a lot of intrusive q’s then doesn’t connect
@billbennettnz Check your traffic is going through the VPN. That Sydney Airport wifi is heavily filtered and may stop your email otherwise
@teh_aimee Not many people know where that is…
@whaeapower Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul and sings the song without the words and never stops at all
The role of parliamentary opposition is to oppose the govt and try to become govt. If you don’t want to, get out and let someone else #rpt

@Kiwiseabreeze Is your email working?
@GraemeEdgeler @therealgregjack Wanted for rape. It’s not exactly parking tickets @1NewsNZ
@Sereeena I would use a stronger word than ‘queasy’

@modsta it's a crash gearbox with a really competent robot driving it
@mikeforbes Can’t beat it on a good day :)
@modsta Loving the DSG. Stick it in ‘sport’ just before you want power and it’s got the turbo already spooled up for you
@modsta Swapped my old MX for it…I miss the perfect balance, but everything else is better
@modsta OK busted, I am a 50-something and I have recently bought a Golf. In my defence it’s a red GTI cabrio and it goes like stink :)
@Danjite That’s the green room at LCA, right?
@marcuschown Or as Yeats put it: The best lack all conviction, while the worst Are full of passionate intensity.

Been a fair bit rain overnight, strong nor-wester at the moment, mixed cloud and sun. Looks worse toward Nelson #weatherbombwatch
@dairymanNZ northerly is getting up again here after a calm patch. Rain holding off so far @serenity22
